Package com.ibm.streams.operator.control.patterns

package com.ibm.streams.operator.control.patterns
Patterns for operators that use with the Job Control Plane. These patterns are provides as part of the Java Operator API and as code samples to demonstrate use of the Job Control Plane.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractNotificationSource
    Abstract operator for listening to notifications from the Job Control Plane and then submitting tuples derived from the notification to an output port.
    NotificationTupleSubmitter
    Notification listener that submits a tuple to an output port with the attributes set from the Notification.
